greatestChange.title: Greatest Change
greatestChange.prio1: Turns your lead over a theatre into an AI bot lead
greatestChange.prio2: Turns a tie over a theatre into an AI bot lead
greatestChange.prio3: Turns your lead over a theatre into a tie
greatestChange.prio4: Increases a more extreme AI bot lead
greatestChange.prio5: Decreases a more extreme lead on your side
greatestChange.prio6: Every other change that does not lead to you winning a campaign/theatre

effects.title: Effects
effects.info1: Industrial production: Add the required number of tokens to the end of its unit row.
effects.info2: Research: Add the drawn special weapon unit into the AI bot’s cup.
effects.info3: Research industry: Place the drawn special weapon unit at the end of the row.
effects.info4: Strategic advantage: Execute the modifier where it would cause the greatest change.
effects.info5: Tactical advantage: Execute the modifier in that theatre as normal.
effects.info6: Propaganda: It receives victory points as normal.
effects.info7: Scientist unit: Treat it as a 3-strength airforce unit.
effects.info8: Blitz unit: If the AI bot has at least one unit remaining, perform step B of the AI bot’s turn again (using the same stratagem), but using the same theatre as the just-placed Blitz unit (if possible).
effects.info9: You play a bombing effect: Select one non-special weapon in the AI bot’s unit row (your choice) and discard it back into the research pile. If all the AI bot’s unit are special weapons, just choose one of those to discard instead.

theatre.title: Theatre
theatre.prio1: A theatre it can close and win
theatre.prio2: A campaign it can close and win

prio3.counterattack: Theatre where you are in lead
prio3.for-the-glory: Hightest VP campaign, then theatres with VP spaces
prio3.secure: Theatre where AI bot is in lead

theatre.prio4: Most empty spaces in open campaign

campaign.title: Campaign space
campaign.prio1: Position that will close and win a theatre/campaign

prio2.economic-warfare: Industrial production if AI bot has ≤4 units, otherwise bombing

unit.title: Unit

prio2.research-development: Special weapon if non-research space was selected

unit.prio4: If last space of campaign: Non-blitz units
unit.prio5: If AI bot ≥20 VP: highest strength units
unit.prio6: Select unit #{unitRoll} (left to right, looping around)
